verses.verse: Paul<WG3972>, a prisoner<WG1198> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> Timothy<WG5095> our brother<WG80>, unto Philemon<WG5371> our<WG2257> dearly beloved<WG27>, and<WG2532> fellow-worker<WG4904>,
And<WG2532> to<WG27> our beloved<WG27> Apphia<WG682>, and<WG2532> Archippus<WG751> our<WG2257> fellowsoldier<WG4961>, and<WG2532> to the church<WG1577> in<WG2596> your<WG4675> house<WG3624>:
Grace<WG5485> to you<WG5213>, and<WG2532> peace<WG1515>, from<WG575> God<WG2316> our<WG2257> Father<WG3962> and<WG2532> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.
I thank<WG2168> my<WG3450> God<WG2316>, making<WG4160> mention<WG3417> of you<WG4675> always<WG3842> in<WG1909> my<WG3450> prayers<WG4335>,
Hearing<WG191> of your<WG4675> love<WG26> and<WG2532> faith<WG4102>, which<WG3739> you have<WG2192> toward<WG4314> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG2532> toward<WG1519> all<WG3956> saints<WG40>;

That<WG3704> the communication<WG2842> of your<WG4675> faith<WG4102> may become<WG1096> powerful<WG1756> by<WG1722> the acknowledging<WG1922> of every<WG3956> good thing<WG18> which is<WG3588> in<WG1722> you<WG5213> in<WG1519> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>.

For<WG1063> we have<WG2192> great<WG4183> joy<WG5479> and<WG2532> consolation<WG3874> in<WG1909> your<WG4675> love<WG26>, because<WG3754> the hearts<WG4698> of the saints<WG40> are refreshed<WG373> by<WG1223> you<WG4675>, brother<WG80>.
Therefore<WG1352>, though I might be<WG2192> very<WG4183> bold<WG3954> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> to command<WG2004> you<WG4671> that which is appropriate<WG433>,

Yet for<WG1223> love<WG26>'s sake<WG1223> I<WG3870> rather<WG3123> beg<WG3870> you<WG5607>, being such a one<WG5108> as<WG5613> Paul<WG3972> the aged<WG4246>, and<WG1161> now<WG3570> also<WG2532> a prisoner<WG1198> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.
I beg<WG3870> you<WG4571> for<WG4012> my<WG1700> son<WG5043> Onesimus<WG3682>, whom<WG3739> I have fathered<WG1080> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> bonds<WG1199>:
Which<WG3588> in times past<WG4218> was<WG3588> to you<WG4671> unprofitable<WG890>, but<WG1161> now<WG3570> profitable<WG2173> to you<WG4671> and<WG2532> to me<WG1698>:
Whom<WG3739> I have sent again<WG375>: you<WG4771> therefore<WG1161> receive<WG4355> him<WG846>, that<WG5124> is<WG2076>, my own<WG1699> heart<WG4698>:

Whom<WG3739> I<WG1473> would<WG1014> have retained<WG2722> with<WG4314> me<WG1683>, that<WG2443> in<WG5228> your<WG4675> place<WG5228> he might have ministered<WG1247> unto me<WG3427> in<WG1722> the bonds<WG1199> of the gospel<WG2098>:

But<WG1161> without<WG5565> your<WG4674> consent<WG1106> would I<WG2309> do<WG4160> nothing<WG3762>; that<WG2443> your<WG4675> goodness<WG18> should<WG5600> not<WG3361> be<WG5600> as it were<WG5613> of<WG2596> necessity<WG318>, but<WG235> willingly<WG1595>.
For<WG1063> perhaps<WG5029> he<WG5563> therefore<WG5124> departed<WG5563> for<WG4314> a season<WG5610>, that<WG2443> you should receive<WG568> him<WG846> for ever<WG166>;

Not now<WG3765> as<WG5613> a servant<WG1401>, but<WG235> above<WG5228> a servant<WG1401>, a brother<WG80> beloved<WG27>, especially<WG3122> to me<WG1698>, but<WG1161> how much<WG4214> more<WG3123> unto you<WG4671>, both<WG2532> in<WG1722> the flesh<WG4561>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>?
If<WG1487> you count<WG2192> me<WG1691> therefore<WG3767> a partner<WG2844>, receive<WG4355> him<WG846> as<WG5613> myself<WG1691>.
If<WG1487> he has wronged<WG91> you<WG4571>, or<WG2228> owes<WG3784> you anything<WG5100>, put<WG1677> that<WG5124> on my<WG1698> account<WG1677>;

I<WG1473> Paul<WG3972> have written<WG1125> it with my own<WG1699> hand<WG5495>, I<WG1473> will repay<WG661> it<WG2443>: although I do<WG3004> not<WG3361> say<WG3004> to you<WG4671> how<WG3754> you owe<WG4359> to me<WG3427> even<WG2532> your own self<WG4572> besides<WG4359>.
Yes<WG3483>, brother<WG80>, let<WG3685> me<WG1473> have joy<WG3685> of you<WG4675> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>: refresh<WG373> my<WG3450> hearts<WG4698> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>.
Having confidence<WG3982> in<WG5218> your<WG4675> obedience<WG5218> I wrote<WG1125> to you<WG4671>, knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> you will also<WG2532> do<WG4160> more than<WG5228> I say<WG3004>.

But<WG1161><WG99999> prepare<WG2090> me<WG3427> also<WG2532> a lodging<WG3578>: for<WG1063> I trust<WG1679> that<WG3754> through<WG1223> your<WG5216> prayers<WG4335> I shall be restored<WG5483> to you<WG5213>.
There greet<WG782><WG99999> Epaphras<WG1889>, my<WG3450> fellowprisoner<WG4869> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>;
Marcus<WG3138>, Aristarchus<WG708>, Demas<WG1214>, Lucas<WG3065>, my<WG3450> fellow-workers<WG4904>.
The grace<WG5485> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> your<WG5216> spirit<WG4151>. Amen<WG281>. Written from Rome to Philemon, by Onesimus, a servant.
